location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 151P from Charles Umpherston Aitchison, Secretary to the Government of India, Fort William [Calcutta] to William Wedderburn, Acting Secretary to the Government of Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter documenting the approval of the Governor General in Council of Lewis Pelly's work in resolving a misunderstanding between Midhut Pasha (Ottoman Governor of Iraq) and the Chief of Bahrain.
